text: A few days after filing the complaint , the lawyers received a stack of documents in Hebrew and in English regarding the 1982 Israeli invasion of Lebanon and the Sabra and Shatila events . The documents include meeting reports , and intelligence service and interrogation reports . The lawyers refused to reveal the source of the documents .
